Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Racine/Grenshaw
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Roosevelt, Loomis, Taylor and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/Grenshaw.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, Roosevelt, Loomis, Taylor and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/Grenshaw.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier fire department activity at Wilson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier fire department activity at Wilson.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Howard and Belmont to provide connecting service.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
